nodes.text: The Taris asteroid belt was located in the Taris system. It contained a number of asteroids orbiting the sun, including the Rogue moon which orbited in the opposite direction to the rest.

The asteroid belt was the site of the final test of the five Padawans training at the Jedi Tower on Taris. It was later used by Zayne Carrick to hide for a time after his initial escape from the planet.
